name: Race
description: User-defined table with suggested values for patient race classification based on CDC codes

values.definition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of North and South America (including Central America) and who maintains tribal affiliation or community attachment
A person having origins in any of the original peoples of the Far East, Southeast Asia, or the Indian subcontinent
A person having origins in any of the black racial groups of Africa

values.description: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander
values.definition: A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Hawaii, Guam, Samoa, or other Pacific Islands
A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Europe, the Middle East, or North Africa
Used when race does not fit into standard categories or multiple races are indicated
Race information is not available or not provided

notes: These codes include CDC Race and Ethnicity codes adopted by HL7 in 2005. Values contain pre-calculated Mod 10 check digit. If value is unknown, use empty field.
